A simple HTML form could be...


                   <form action="">
                       <label for="name">name</label>
                       <input type="text">
                       <label for="age">age</label>
                       <input type="text">
                       <label for="password">password</label>
                       <input type="password">
                   </form>

The Dom

The dom is

  • the defining document
  • A way manage data
  • A tree of html tags
  • The structure of html
  • The document object model [Dom)

The dom tree is nested html tags


                    <div>
                        <section>
                            <h1></h1>
                        </section>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <div>
                            <button></button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div></div>
